SELECT r.room_code room_code, r.acm_code acm_code, r.room_name room_name, r.room_type room_type, r.total_rooms total_rooms,
TO_CHAR(r.check_in_time, 'HH24:MI') check_in_time, TO_CHAR(r.check_out_time,'HH24:MI') check_out_time, r.room_capacity room_capacity, r.room_max_capacity room_max_capacity, r.room_weekday_price room_weekday_price, r.room_weekend_price room_weekend_price, NVL(r.peak_season_weekday_price, 0) peak_season_weekday_price, NVL(r.peak_season_weekend_price, 0) peak_season_weekend_price, r.room_info room_info, r.room_amenities room_amenities, r.room_status room_status FROM ROOM r
WHERE r.acm_code = #{acmCode}
ORDER BY room_code
